fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything, they gain an Ice Mark and you learn their name.
- Roleblock immune.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, choose one:
> - Redirect a player with an Ice Mark to another player with an Ice Mark.
> - Cause all visits against a player with an Ice Mark to fail.
> - Transport two players with Ice Marks.
- You may only choose each mode up to twice.
**White Blanket** â€” Cause all non-Everfrost players' night abilities to not resolve tonight. You may only use this ability once each game.
